reviewText:
Anyone who is a fan of the gators would love this dvd.  I was a student during their back to back run and every time I watch this dvd it takes me back to the good old days.

GO GATORS!

If you are a fan of florida, or a college basketball fan in general, this is a dvd to own. As a Florida Gator fan, this DVD brought me near tears, as I remember just how special this team really was. The video shown is great, the extra features are fantastic, but the part with the players sitting in a circle and talking about it is probably the best. If you want to remember Dem Gator Boyz, this is the DVD to have! Go Gators!
This is very cool.  I loved seeing behind the scenes and in the locker room.
They followed through on all areas as stated . I will continue to use this company.
